body_html:
@yaroslavvb I see, thanks for your quick reply. I'm not sure p2p connetctivity, testing on 4 K40 gpu cards.
Another thing can you help me look at this ?
I find average_gradients(tower_grads) costing lots of time.
average gradients problem

body:
@yaroslavvb  I see, thanks for your quick reply. I'm not sure p2p connetctivity, testing on 4 K40 gpu cards.
Another thing can you help me look at this ?
I find average_gradients(tower_grads) costing lots of time. 
[average gradients problem](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/39952878/tensorflow-multi-gpu-much-slower-than-single-gpu-if-embeddingvocabulary-is-la)
